comment.author: Connor
comment.text: Psst... Hillary I speak English because this is America...

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: America doesn't have an official language, moron!

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Wow... You need to relax.. did you miss your meds this morning... so volatile.. official language? We speak English.. I just bet you cant speak Spanish..

replies.author: Shawna
replies.text: Connor obviously a Trump supporter ðŸ™„

replies.author: Kristen
replies.text: Psst mark... Did you know there are more than one language spoken in America? K, thanks!

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Connor , the official language in Germany is German. There's a law stating so. Same goes for France, Italy, etc. There is nothing in the American law that sets English as the official language. I wasn't born in this country and neither did I go to school here, but I know that. How come you don't? You are American born here, aren't you?
